supports-color

Detect whether a terminal supports color

Install

sh $ npm install --save supports-color

Usage

```js var supportsColor = require(‘supports-color’);

if (supportsColor) { console.log(‘Terminal supports color’); } ```

It obeys the --color and --no-color CLI flags.

CLI

sh $ npm install --global supports-color

```sh $ supports-color –help

Usage $ supports-color

Exits with code 0 if color is supported and 1 if not

```
